node.title: Hawke's Bay Covid-19 case confirmed after routine swab at hospital
node.description: A Covid-19 case has been confirmed in Hawke's Bay after the person visited Hawke's Bay hospital.
node.content:
["A Covid-19 case has been confirmed in Hawke's Bay after the person visited Hawke's Bay hospital.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Peter Fowler\n
", "The Ministry of Health said in a release the person tested positive for Covid-19 as part of routine surveillance swabbing for the virus when they visited Hawke's Bay Hospital's emergency department after feeling unwell.", "All emergency department staff were wearing appropriate PPE and none were stood down, it said.", "The case investigation began last night and the person is isolating, with monitoring from the local public health unit.", "The public health team has identified close household contacts who are all now isolating, the ministry said.", "The ministry said there will be further interviews with the positive case and testing for all close and wider contacts will continue today.", "The DHB reported that the latest case and wh\u0101nau were being very helpful and following public health advice.", "The ministry said a number of potential exposure sites, such as the DHB's emergency department, have already been identified and anyone affected will be contacted.", "A supermarket, an ice cream shop and a pharmacy have been added as locations of interest in Hawke's Bay.", "Anyone who visited any of the following sites at the specified times is asked to monitor themselves for symptoms and if they develop to get tested for Covid-19.", "The ministry's web page will be updated with locations when identified and confirmed as a result of today's reported case.", "The ministry said it was confirming this case prior to the usual 1pm statement to encourage testing today and the case will be included in today's tally of reported cases.", "Testing locations in Hawke's Bay:", "Testing by Appointment:"]
